sentences.english: Today I receive salary RMB 0000 from Modim Fashion Corporation Ltd.

sentences.english: Players can also fine-tune their characters' clothing, size and expressions.
sentences.chinese: 玩家也能自由调整他们角色的服饰，体型和外表。

sentences.english: The arrival of Princess Wen Cheng and promote Tibetan culture, the integration of clothing with the Central Plains.
sentences.chinese: 文成公主的到来，推动了藏族服饰同中原文化的融合。

sentences.english: Customers trust and support the development of power Surpass clothing.

sentences.english: In your opinion,which radio station is the worst? [15:26.64]This clothing store has the most fashionable clothes in the city.

sentences.english: Pretty and touching dresses are girls' eternal choice.

sentences.english: When Peng Liyuan begins to sing, 16 actresses in Tibetan clothes accompany her with dance.
sentences.chinese: 彭丽媛演唱，十六名藏族服饰的女演员为她伴舞。

sentences.english: There is all kind of furnishing in the shop.

sentences.english: Besides there are also fish themed fashion costumes.
sentences.chinese: 此外还有以鱼为主题的时尚服饰。

sentences.english: EUROPEAN FOLK contains examples of the design of everyday textiles and costumes of rural Central and South-Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 本书精选中欧和东南欧部的日常服饰设计实例。

sentences.english: Develop the architecture for the clothing e-commerce network in the background management system.
sentences.chinese: 开发出针对服饰电子商务网后台管理系统的架构。

sentences.english: Products of the Company to Joe Wani Matai, Zhanyuan brand clothing items for the Main.
sentences.chinese: 本公司产品以乔迩玛泰，占元品牌服饰为主营项目。

sentences.english: Winkle pickers were the second generation rockers and very much the property of the early sixties generation.
sentences.chinese: 尖头鞋是第二代摇滚人的服饰，流行于六十年代早期。

sentences.english: Let this person be tastefully dressed in the trendiest clothes, confident and impressive.
sentences.chinese: 这个人穿着潮流服饰，自信，给人深刻的印象。

definition: to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
